course_title: Studies in Music Theory: Form & Analysis of Tonal Music
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 7Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Music majors: This course counts as Category C.
course_description: This is a variable topics course in music theory. Each study treats a special topic in the field by implementing various analytical techniques, discussion sessions, and writing of papers.
prerequisites: MUS 221 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3371, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: K. Wendland, Status: Open
